import React from 'react' import classes from './PostView.module.css' import NewInput from '../NewInput/NewInput' import { getDataByToken } from '../../../fetch' const PostView = ({cuurentPosts, content, date, advancedInfo, idKey}) => { return (

{content}

{date}

{advancedInfo ?

By {advancedInfo}

:
}
{!advancedInfo ? {let res = await getDataByToken(`http://127.0.0.1:5000/delete_post/${idKey}`) post alert(res.data.msg) } } />:
}
) } export default PostView
